item.description:
The BCM festival is a two day Celtic Music festival which features music and dancing from Irish, Scottich and other performers. The 2009 Boston Celtic Music Fest (BCMFest) finale concert will spotlight dance from the "four corners" of Boston's most popular Celtic and Celtic-influenced
traditions. "BCMFest Dance Spotlight" will be the grand climax of the two day festival.

BCMFest will celebrate its sixth year with an array of concerts and other
special events at venues in Harvard Square and Medford, featuring some of Greater
Boston's best performers of Irish, Scottish, Cape Breton, as well as Appalachian and
other Celtic-influenced music. For more informationabout the festival itself, visit the web site: http://www.bcmfest.co...

During the course of the Spotlight Finale, the house band will welcome a bevy of guest
performers for songs and tunes, with a special emphasis on featuring dance from the
Irish, Scottish, Cape Breton and Appalachian/old-timey traditions. For more information about the finale,visit the web site: http://www.bcmfest.co...

Tickets are $15 for the performance and can be bought at the following web site:
http://tickets.passim...

Tickets can also be purchased for Friday evening and Saturday daytime through the Club Passim web site.

I will send out an update Monday if we can get a group discount and if tickets can be bought at the door.
item.how_to_find_us: I willbe out front of the church with a meetup sign at 8:00

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Celtic Music Festival Dance Spotlight
